line_1: The sight our foolish heart inflames,
line_2: We long for pine apples in frames,
And whispers all her lovers names;

line_1: Distraction soon each burning breast inflames,
line_2: And from the tyrant foe a victim claims!

line_1: While conscious innocence his tongue inflames:
line_2: The base impostor's guilty madness blames,

line_1: From what debilitates and what inflames,
line_2: Calls him away from selfish ends and aims,

line_1: But when strong beer their free-born hearts inflames,
line_2: They sell him bargains, and they call him names.
